text: Busan National University of Education Station () is a station of the Busan Metro Line 1 & Donghae Line in Geoje-dong, Yeonje District, Busan, South Korea. It was named as such due to its proximity to the Busan National University of Education located on the west side of the station. ==Station Layout== ===Line 1=== {|style="text-align:center;" |- | ↑ |- || S/B N/B |- | ↓ |} {| border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" frame="hsides" rules="rows" |- !
